title: Creating Interactive Web Experiences with Three.js

cells.content:
# Creating Interactive Web Experiences with Three.js

In this tutorial, I'll walk through how to create engaging 3D web experiences using Three.js, a powerful JavaScript library that makes WebGL accessible to web developers.

## Why Three.js?

Three.js abstracts away much of the complexity of WebGL while still providing impressive performance and capabilities. It's perfect for creating:

- Interactive product showcases
- Data visualizations
- 3D games
- Creative web experiments

The library handles the hard parts like scene setup, camera controls, lighting, and rendering, letting you focus on creating amazing experiences.

## Adding Interactivity

One of the most powerful aspects of Three.js is how easily you can add interactivity to your scenes. With just a few lines of code, you can create objects that respond to user input.
